name: Study Jam - Kubernetes (POSTPONED)
description:
Hi All. We were going to kick off GDG Portsmouth with a Study Jam on Kubernetes Feb 16th but our facility fell through. We're looking diligently for a replacement venue but more than likely we'll need to push this meetup out a week or two. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. Hopefully it is not too late to find something else fun to do this weekend! We'll keep you posted. Stay tuned!

-----------------------------------------------------------

We're going to kick off GDG Portsmouth NH with what we call a Study Jam. What is a Study Jam you may ask? Well, basically we grab a 4 hour block of time on a Saturday and start working our way through a course/quest on Qwiklabs.com. This year we're aiming to host 4 of these events. The topics will be Kubernetes, IoT, Machine Learning and Security. Stay tuned for the official announcement of topic, time and location. I promise you won't have to wait too long. Feel free to reach out to us if you have any questions.

name: Droidcon Boston 2019 - 20% off Code
description:
Hi All,

Quick update. Early Bird pricing ends April 1st (no joke). The 20% off should be on top of that.

GDG Portsmouth now has a Droidcon Boston 2019 discount code. 20% off up until the day of the event.

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/droidcon-boston-2019-tickets-51797973132?discount=GDG-Portsmouth-20-Off

Droidcon is a global developer conference series and networking event focused on the best of Android. The idea behind Droidcon is to support the Android platform and create a strong network for developers and companies.

The 3rd edition of Droidcon Boston takes place from April 08-09, 2019 at the Calderwood Pavillion. Droidcon Boston 2018 had over 30 speakers presenting over 2 days, as well as birds of a feather sessions, four workshops, and a party!

Droidcon Boston is part of the global Droidcon community with over 20 Droidcons organized worldwide in 2018.
